creator: Halo Service Solutions Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Halo iOS App, free to download and use with your HaloITSM, HaloPSA or Halo Service Desk web application, and compliment all the fantastic functionality you get in the main application.

Features of the app include:
- Access tickets assigned to you
- Access your teams
- Access your team's Tickets
- Action tickets based on your workflows
- Receive notifications
- Customer list
- Links to the web application for other features
- Searching Halo

and many more features coming soon.

HaloITSM will transform your current ways of working into intuitive, up-to-the-minute workflows. It will give your teams the ability to deliver the very best in service – to customers and employees alike. And do that consistently, and repeatedly. HaloITSM is a single, all-inclusive ITSM software solution, and it won’t just standardise your processes. It will also deliver valuable analytics, so you can match your IT delivery to the true needs of your business. Present – and future.

Halo PSA is the all-in-one platform that transforms how Service Providers deliver managed IT services to customers. Everything an MSP needs is all in one place. Flexible, configurable software that automates processes across your business.

Halo Service Desk is an ITIL-aligned help desk software that offers ticket tracking and customer relationship management modules with reporting capabilities.
descriptionShort: The HaloITSM, HaloPSA and Halo Service Desk android application.

descriptionShort: The HaloITSM, HaloPSA and Halo Service Desk android application.
title: Halo ITSM, PSA, Service Desk

creator: Halo Service Solutions Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Halo Service Solutions app for iOS devices, free to download and use with your main version of HaloITSM, HaloPSA or Halo Service Desk. The Halo app compliments all the fantastic functionality offered in the main application and allows you to stay on track whilst on the go.

Features of the app include:
- Access tickets assigned to you
- Action tickets based on your workflows
- Access your teams
- Access your team's Tickets
- Receive notifications
- List customers
- Searching Halo
- Links to the web application for other features
- And many more to come

Halo Service Solutions offers ITSM, PSA and Service Desk software, which are relied upon in over 50 countries.

HaloITSM is a single, all-inclusive ITSM software solution. It will transform your current ways of working into intuitive, up-to-the-minute workflows, as well as give your teams the ability to deliver the very best in service to customers and employees alike. It won’t just standardize your processes, but it will also deliver valuable analytics, so you can match your IT delivery to the true needs of your business, present, and future.

HaloPSA is a single, all-inclusive solution, designed for MSPs and service providers. HaloPSA gives you the power to manage your entire business with powerful out-of-the-box functionality. Empower your business with a single all-inclusive cloud platform, designed for your as-a-service business. With an integrated PSA platform you will experience features such as time-tracking and billing, advanced reporting, asset management, remote access, seamless integrations, automation tools and more. Tailored to your requirements with an intuitive UI, you can remedy your client issues with an unlimited PSA solution.

Halo Service Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution designed to streamline processes related to workflow management, operations automation, customer & employee engagement, and more.
descriptionShort: The HaloITSM, HaloPSA and Halo Service Desk android application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Assets feature added.

The assets area has been added to the navigation bar on the mobile apps. Here you can list assets by type, all assets or your bookmarked assets. Asset details, tickets and attachments can also be viewed.

Options to Move and Bookmark assets are available on the asset details screen and by bulk-selecting on asset lists.

A barcode scanner has been added to be able to find existing assets.

Various minor bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Journey actions can. now be performed in the app.

Fixed an issue opening the app after already having logged in before.

HaloITSM is a single, all-inclusive ITSM software solution. It will transform your current ways of working into intuitive, up-to-the-minute workflows, as well as give your teams the ability to deliver the very best in service to customers and employees alike. It won’t just standardize your processes, but it will also deliver valuable analytics, so you can match your IT delivery to the true needs of your business, present, and future.

HaloPSA is a single, all-inclusive solution, designed for MSPs and service providers. HaloPSA gives you the power to manage your entire business with powerful out-of-the-box functionality. Tailored to your requirements with an intuitive UI, you can remedy your client issues with an unlimited PSA solution.

HaloCRM is omnichannel customer service software, designed for teams looking to drive greater efficiency when handling customer enquiries. HaloCRM offers an intuitive platform for customer-facing teams to manage conversations from any channel. The platform will ingest customer conversations from Twitter, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, email, SMS, chat, phone calls and more, eliminating the possibility of missed enquiries, and improving customer satisfaction by opening more channels of communication.

Halo Service Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution designed to streamline processes related to workflow management, operations automation, customer & employee engagement, and more.

- Fixed an issue saving/loading app data
- Fixed an issue where in some cases the app could crash when opening
- Fixed an issue with the display of checkboxes when viewing a ticket

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can now attach images to actions by clicking the paperclip on Actions.

You can now use the system use "Issue Items" to issue items on the mobile app. This will pop up a barcode scanner and issue items button to add items with specific quantities to the ticket.

- Fixed issues cancelling the log-in flow
- Fixed a SQLLite disk full error
- Fixed an error that can occur when loading the new action screen with a dropdown that doesn't have a name for one of its values
- Fixed an issue with the display of date-time custom fields

title:
Halo ITSM, PSA, CRM
1.3.3
